sections.summary: i'm a fast-learning and enthusiastic animator seeking professional experience. i have over 7 years of formal art training, both digital and traditional. i'm skilled at design and character animation. software skills animation: toon boom harmony, tv paint, adobe flash illustration: adobe photoshop, adobe illustrator, aseprite, paintool sai, gimp post-production: adobe after-effects, adobe premiere, final cut pro
